‘Helipad’ appears on plan for new Takapuna beach home, no landing rights sought https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/helipad-appears-on-plan-for-new-takapuna-new-takapuna-beach-home-no-no-land-rights-shight-shights/sgbfla7ewbbbuhkbuhkufzatkgpijbmm/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/helipad-appears-on-plan-for-new-takapuna-new-takapuna-beach-home-no-no-land-rights-shight-shights/sgbfla7ewbbbuhkbuhkufzatkgpijbmm/ Anne GibsonThe word 'helipad' is on approved plans but the council says no landing rights are sought. Mon, 24 Mar 2025 05:00:00 +0000 A four-level beachfront house on The Strand in Takapuna Beach is nearing completion. Plans lodged with Auckland Council have the word 'helipad' on a structure on the roof. Plans refer to the rooftop area of the home to the far left where white metal beams are in a grid formation. Photo / Jason Dorday
